body.name: Andalou Naturals Lavender & Biotin Full Volume Shampoo,Purple,11.5 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 23 hrs 11 mins
features: Volumizing Shampoo: Ideal for thin, fine to medium hair, this deep-cleansing formula helps to add lift, body and shine. Refreshes hair while adding strength and smoothness for a more volumized, healthy look

Inspired By Nature: Fruit stem cell complex and lavender refresh while biotin B-complex nourishes with essential proteins to support strength, texture and manageability. The result is noticeably thicker looking hair
Ingredients From Nature: Andalou Naturals products are 98% nature-derived and vegetarian with a large vegan offering. Plus, we're gluten-free and cruelty-free—we never test on animals

Fruit Stem Cell Science: A blend of nature’s most potent bioactive stem cells from the Heirloom Apple, Grape, Swiss Alpine Rose, Argan Tree and Hemp Plant support skin protection, restoration and radiance
Andalou Naturals: Non-GMO remains a core brand value of Andalou Naturals and we continue to source superior non-GMO ingredients for our products
body.description: Andalou Naturals embodies beauty in action. We infuse the best of nature and knowledge into mindful and effective products that are good for people and the planet. Our skin care, hair care and body care products are made thoughtfully and beautifully, blending advanced Fruit Stem Cell Science with natural and fair-trade ingredients, with a minimum 70% certified organic content, for visible and healthy results. The meaning of Andalou is ‘Path of Light’, and we believe it best reflects our intention to foster good things in the world and enrich the lives we touch, one responsible product at a time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Full Volume Shampoo Full Volume Conditioner Full Volume Style Spray Benefit Uses Lavender to stimulate the hair follicles and Biotin-B Complex to add essential protein for thicker, fuller hair. Gently refreshes and stimulates as biotin B-complex nourishes with essential proteins to support strength, texture, and manageability. Add lift, body and shine with this style spray.

Key Ingredients Lavender Lavender gently refreshes and stimulates the hair follicle. Aloe Vera Ultra-hydrating Aloe Vera uplifts skin's protective moisture barrier. Grape Stem Cells Helps protect your hair against harmful UV radiation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this natural shampoo for my fine hair
reviews.reviewText: The whole family uses this shampoo. From my fine, wavy hair to my husband's and daughters thick, curly hair (my daughter has 3b curly hair) it works great for all of us. It has a nice, mellow lavender scent that isn't overpowering which I appreciate. It makes my hair feel really clean without drying it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2018
reviews.reviewText: It is a strong lavender scent when you first lather it up on your hair, but it quickly dissipates. The first time I used it was the first wash a week after a perm. The first wash didn't lather so I rinsed it and did a second wash, and I got a good lather. I'll see what happens the next time I use it. I just had to find something that does not have all the bad chemicals in it like Suave and almost every other brand I looked at on the shelves in the store. I've used Suave for years and never knew about all the bad chemicals in it until recently when I saw someone post on Facebook about it. Now I'm really aware of these bad guys and had to get new shampoo, cream rinse, shower gel, hand cream, and even today found it in the antibacterial soft soap at my kitchen sink!I'm glad the shipping box didn't get damaged because there was NO packing around the 4 Andalou products I ordered, and I did not see a link for rating packaging on this order to let them know. The shampoo and cream rinse were in a clear shrink wrap, but had the box been damaged, I don't think that would have prevented damage or leakage. Amazon needs to be more careful packaging orders.Update: I love it so much that I reordered another bottle of the shampoo when it ran out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo does leave your hair feeling super dry so a moisturizer or conditioner is necessary. I do enjoy using this shampoo and it has far less chemicals than other shampoos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent shampoo - Update
reviews.reviewText: I just learned yesterday that my thyroid was way too low. I have been prescribed the wrong dosage of Synthroid for 3 months, a mistake of the doctor's office. First things affected, hair and nails. Therefore, I can't really hope for volume. But since I read on the GMO website that Andalou was offering good products of quality, really natural and soft, I will purchase again since I need a non-sulfate shampoo with biotin to help recover from that medical mistake. I recommend it.----------------I love the formula in that brand of shampoo. It really shows that it's almost "bad chemicals" free. The foam is different from the commercial brands. However, I wash my hair every other day and I can't tell that I feel that my hair is manageable with that shampoo. I have a fine and dry hair. I wake up in the morning and it seems that the volume I had the day before is gone. I'm going to use it because I experience hair loss and Ireally see that it's very gentle but I'm not thrilled by the results. If you already have thick hair, it's okay but if you have fine hair, maybe you won't be satisfied to pay that price for shampoo. I was expecting more body in my hair. It didn't happen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe ingredients good results

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sparks Of Hope
reviews.reviewText: My hair has been thinning for the last few years. I didn't think it was too bad until my oldest daughter said something. I ignored it for a little while, until I looked in the mirror and realized I could clearly see more of my scalp than I ever have. I was so sad and embarrassed. I just turned 44, I knew my body was changing, I was stressed with everyday life, and having covid, I noticed even more changes physically. I tried this shampoo, I have always been skeptical of products that say anything about helping with anything. I now have a spark of hope, my hair seems thicker just after 3 uses. I wash my hair every other day, I always have, I noticed I didn't lose as much hair after the 2nd use, and my hair did not have a dry feel as has with other shampoos (moisture level has improved)I am hesitant to get too excited, but so far so good. I will now be purchasing the conditioner, hopefully it will prove to be a truthful product. Everyone's body is different an needs different things, hopefully this helps people who are having similar or same problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I threw it away, 1/2 full, 5 months later
reviews.reviewText: It was not good. Doesn't lather. Leaves hair feeling greasy and looking greasy. Hair was actually appeared more dirty after using than before. It doesn't smell very nice either. I would not recommend this to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Product is different....
reviews.reviewText: I've bought this shampoo many times, obviously happy with it. But this time the shampoo isn't as thick, actually almost watery. I feel cheated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 14, 2015
reviews.reviewText: This is an amazing shampoo. After using the first time my hair felt thicker, was glossier and much more manageable. If your hair seems to be thinner and lacking 'body', give it a try, I'm sure you won't be disappointed. Smells really lovely too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 29, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I find this very soothing on my scalp. I sometimes suffer from psoriasis and using this has meant that I'm not having to use steroid lotion as often as I have in the past. Will repurchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 26, 2015
reviews.reviewText: I have very fine hair due to medication I take. This shampoo is brilliant and smells lovely as well! A winner on all accounts

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 1, 2019
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice shampoo but it says it is certified gluten free (and has been recommended to me as gluten free) but it contains Hydrolyzed Barley Protein, which is a gluten product. I bought it and am now questioning my choice as I am highly sensitive to gluten, even in products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 14, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: Great product love the smell and it's packed full of ...
reviews.reviewText: Great product love the smell and it's packed full of natural ingredients with no nasties or harmful chemicals. I shall be re-ordering!
